Package seccommerce.pdf

Class seccommerce.pdf.PDFAnnotationDataItem extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 20170607001L

Serialized Fields

pdfDisplayAnnotation

boolean pdfDisplayAnnotation
PDF-signature: display reader operated verification item?

pdfAddAnnotationAsPageContent

boolean pdfAddAnnotationAsPageContent
PDF-signature: does the annotation shall be empty and the appearance stream be inserted as page content?

pdfTransparentBackground

boolean pdfTransparentBackground
PDF-signature: display a transparent background?

invertPageRotation

boolean invertPageRotation
PDF-signature: shall be rotated inversely to page rotation

pdfSignatureSignedImage

byte[] pdfSignatureSignedImage
The default signature annotation has a "signed" image in the left bottom corner and an icon in the right bottom corner

pdfShowSignedImage

boolean pdfShowSignedImage
PDF-signature: display 'signed' image at the bottom of the image

pdfSignatureSignerIcon

byte[] pdfSignatureSignerIcon
The default signature annotation has a signers icon in the right bottom corner

pdfShowSignerIcon

boolean pdfShowSignerIcon
PDF-signature: display signer icon on reader operated verification item as jpg (max. 220x70 pixel)

pdfSigBackgroundImage

byte[] pdfSigBackgroundImage
PDF-signature: display reader operated verification item as jpg (max. 220x70 pixel)

pdfSigBackgroundImageTextOverlay

boolean pdfSigBackgroundImageTextOverlay
PDF-signature: display text on reader operated verification item as jpg (max. 220x70 pixel)

pdfSignatureReason

java.lang.String pdfSignatureReason
PDF-signature: reason for signing

pdfSigContactInfo

java.lang.String pdfSigContactInfo
PDF-signature: contact info of signer

pdfSigShowDate

boolean pdfSigShowDate
PDF-signature: display date and time in signature annotation

pdfSignatureLocation

java.lang.String pdfSignatureLocation
PDF-signature: location of signer at signing time

pdfSignaturePosition

int pdfSignaturePosition
PDF-signature: position of signature in document

pdfSignatureWidth

int pdfSignatureWidth
PDF-signature: width

pdfSignatureHeight

int pdfSignatureHeight
PDF-signature: height

pdfSignaturePadding

int pdfSignaturePadding
PDF-signature: padding

pdfFormFieldName

java.lang.String pdfFormFieldName
PDF-signature: the position is given by a form field. the rect entry of form fields dictionary will be used.

pdfOutlineName

java.lang.String pdfOutlineName
PDF-signature: the position is given by an outline. This is not really pdf compliant but a whish by Justiz Niedersachsen

rootDir

java.lang.String rootDir
For SecSignerServer: files in this dir or it's subdirs will be annotated with given data

textSizeAndPosition

java.lang.String textSizeAndPosition
Size and position for text (signer, time, etc.) in signature annotation. This must be a string of digits of length 6: The first two digits give the text size, the middle and last two digits the coordinates for the left upper corner as percentage of the annotation image's size. If the parameter is not set, the text size will be 10 and the left upper corner will be at pixel (16,0).

isSigAnnotLabels

boolean isSigAnnotLabels
Signature annotation data can be labeled ('am', 'in', 'Ort' ...).

java.lang.String xmlDSigReferenceUri

_xmlDSigNodePath

java.lang.String _xmlDSigNodePath

_xmlDSigFilterPaths

XPathTransformFilter[] _xmlDSigFilterPaths
paths to be added as transform filters in the to be created XML signature node

useLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat

boolean useLegacyBmuXmlSigFormat
true to add redundant signer information only for BMU ZKS waste signatures and to create a signature conforming to an old XAdES version where SigningCertificate and SignerRole still have version 1. Shall not be set to true after 2017-06-31 according to information from Consist.

_includeDocument

java.lang.Boolean _includeDocument
Decides whether the signed data are included in the SignedData structure. Overwrites the default of the batch. (default = false)

_includeSignatureIntoPDF

java.lang.Boolean _includeSignatureIntoPDF
Decides whether the signature is included into the PDF file ('PDF signature'). Overwrites the default of the batch. (default = false)

_includeSignersCertificate

java.lang.Boolean _includeSignersCertificate
Decides whether the signed data include the signer's certificate. Overwrites the default of the batch. (default = true)

_hashAlgorithm

java.lang.String _hashAlgorithm
hash algorithm.

pssPadding

boolean pssPadding
true for RSA-PSS padding, false for PKCS#1 v1.5 or ECC
